us.title: Endless Map
us.desc: The game map should be infinite, randomly generated by the computer. Differently sized rooms connected with corridors.

us.title: Character Development
us.desc: The player needs to be able to upgrade their character's skills and abilities. This can happen when enough experience points.

us.title: Character Classes
us.desc: There should be 4 playable character classes, capable of surviving alone, but also useful to each other in multiplayer.

us.title: Singeplayer Mode
us.desc: The player chooses a class and fights off waves of monsters, trying to get a place in the highscore. He can't save the game and starts over when he dies.

us.title: Different Map Themes
us.desc: The theme of the game map should change between 2-3 styles randomly every once in a while.

us.title: Playing together
us.desc: Description: Players should be able to team up online and play together against the monsters.

us.title: Everyone Against Everyone
us.desc: Players can play online on the same map, fightning against each other.

us.title: Items
us.desc: The player can buy/sell weapons and ammunition from special vending machines.

us.title: Balanced Classes
us.desc: There shouldn't be a class that is too powerful and easily defeats others in multiplayer.

us.title: Character Upgrades
us.desc: The player can buy 'cybernetic' upgrades for their character that give special bonuses.

us.title: Smart Enemies
us.desc: The monsters won't just run straight into the characters like kamikadzes, they will try to use basic tactics.
